dta.DynameqScenario¶

class dta.DynameqScenario(startTime, endTime)¶

Bases: dta.Scenario.Scenario

A Dynameq Scenario.

__init__(startTime, endTime)¶

Constructor. Creates empty Dynameq scenario

Methods

__init__ x.__init__(...) initializes x; see x.__class__.__doc__ for signature

addEvent(eventTime, eventDescription)¶

eventTime is a datetime.datetime instance and description is a string.

Verifies that eventTime is in [startTime, endTime)

addVehicleClass(vehicleClassName)¶

vehicleClassName is a string

addVehicleClassGroup(vehicleClassGroup)¶

vehicleClassGroup is a VehicleClassGroup object

addVehicleType(vehicleType)¶

vehicleType is a VehicleType

getVehicleClassGroup(vehicleClassGroupName)¶

Returns the relevant VehicleClassGroup or throws a DtaError if not found.

iterVehicleClassGroups()¶

Return an iterator to the vehicle class group items

iterVehicleClasses()¶

Return an iterator to the vehicle classes

read(dir, file_prefix)¶

Reads the scenario configuration from the Dynameq scenario file.

write(dir, file_prefix)¶
